duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile data including modeling information, aggregates, PMLs, subsegment data for new programs, and claims analysis.
Provide aggregated results in the requested format and pre-populate proposal templates.
Collaborate with Division Heads to formulate and implement capacity strategies.
Monitor and report contract metrics, and perform ad hoc reporting.
Assist with other duties as assigned by the manager.

education_certification.credential: College graduate and/or applicable training and/or experience.
3+ years analyst, insurance, claims, or relevant experience required.
Advanced skills in Excel required, ability to work with large sets of data.
Experience with Tableau and Power BI.
Advanced skills with Microsoft Office Suite.
Property Insurance Experience with an understanding of property terms and some peril-specific underwriting knowledge (wind, EQ, flood, fire, AOP, BR).
Highly organized and detail-oriented with the ability to collaborate within and across teams.
Superior written and verbal communication skills, problem-solving, and critical thinking abilities.
Highly organized and detail-oriented with the ability to collaborate within and across teams.
Ability to work to a deadline.
